sentences.en: Darkness wold make him more appreciative of sight; silence would teach him the joys of sound.
sentences.cn: 黑暗会使他更珍惜光明; 沉寂将教他享受声音的欢快.

sentences.en: Give the wold the best you and you'll get kicked in the teeth.
sentences.cn: 献出你全部的人生精华造福人类,可能会使你身受打击.

sentences.en: I can't believe wold you say?
sentences.cn: 我才不相信你说的 呢 ?

sentences.en: I wold dine at the best Italian restaurant and drink the best wine.
sentences.cn: 余荒野就餐最好的意大利餐厅和饮料最好的葡萄酒.

sentences.en: I'm the big potato in this wold. I'm going to beyond my dream. beyond!
sentences.cn: 我是世界上的大人物. 我将超越我的梦想! 超越!

sentences.en: If there is no music, it wold be much wonderful!
sentences.cn: 除了听那个烂音乐, 其它的都很好玩.

sentences.en: It has left off raining down in Lincolnshire, at last, and Chesney Wold has taken heart.
sentences.cn: 林肯郡的雨终于停止,切斯尼山庄也跟着热闹起来了.

sentences.en: My involvement with the Sea Org wold remain peripheral.
sentences.cn: 我之所以能与他们分担痛苦,只不过是因为我有资金.

sentences.en: The space vehicle wold would return to earth Earth and land in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 太空飞船将返回地球并降落在海洋中.

sentences.en: The Uruguay Round and the establishment the WTO the character of the wold trading system.
sentences.cn: 乌拉圭回合和世界贸易组织的建立改变了世界贸易体系的性质.

sentences.en: The wold puts off its mask of vastness lover.
sentences.cn: 世界对著它的爱人,把它浩瀚的面具揭下了.

sentences.en: Tom Morris , present - day owner of Ruskin Antiques, Stow - on - the - Wold, specialises in works made by the Movement's craftsmen.
sentences.cn: 在斯托昂泽沃尔德的拉斯金古玩店现在的店主汤姆 - 莫里斯, 专营工艺美术运动时代的手工艺者创作的作品.

sentences.en: Yesterday I was sad, today I am excited, I don't know tomorrow how wold I be.
sentences.cn: 以前的我喜欢了解别人, 现在的我学着了解自己,总觉得自己是自己最大的敌人.

sentences.en: You can laugh at wold, but, the most important thing is, never laugh at other's dreams.
sentences.cn: 你可以嘲笑整个世界, 但请记住, 最重要的是, 千万不要嘲笑别人的梦想.

trans.tran_cn: （不毛的）高原，荒原，（常复数）丘陵地
